BodyName: Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to requiring the commissioner of the department of correction to  report on census data and  security  indicators involving adolescents in city jails.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the commissioner of the department of correction to give a monthly report to the council regarding census data and violent incidents involving adolescents in city jails.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to requiring the commissioner of the department of correction to  report on census data and  security  indicators involving adolescents in city jails.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring the commissioner of the department of correction to give a monthly report to the council regarding census data and violent incidents involving adolescents in city jails.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to requiring the commissioner of the department of correction to  report on census data and  security  indicators involving adolescents in city jails.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to requiring the commissioner of the department of correction to  report on census data and  security  indicators involving adolescents in city jails.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
